name: Tome
description: Tome creates stunning presentations and narratives using AI, transforming your ideas into polished stories.
about: Tome is an AI-native format for crafting and sharing ideas. It uses generative AI to help you create compelling narratives, presentations, and one-pagers with beautiful layouts. Simply start with a prompt and Tome generates an entire presentation complete with text and AI-generated images that match your content.

seo.metaDescription: Tome creates stunning presentations and narratives using AI, transforming your ideas into polished stories.
